name: feature-analyst-v2
description: Multifamily Unit Feature Comparison Tool - Monorepo

scripts.build: yarn workspace @feature-analyst/shared build && yarn workspace @feature-analyst/backend build && yarn workspace @feature-analyst/frontend build
scripts.lint: yarn workspace @feature-analyst/backend lint && yarn workspace @feature-analyst/frontend lint
scripts.type-check: yarn workspace @feature-analyst/backend type-check && yarn workspace @feature-analyst/frontend type-check
scripts.test: yarn workspace @feature-analyst/backend test && yarn workspace @feature-analyst/frontend test
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/dist frontend/node_modules shared/dist shared/node_modules node_modules
